rows.label: qev013201_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm? What's this? Another hopeful recruit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0002
rows.name:
You got the guts to hack it on this team, recruit?
Pathfinders all got a death wish, you know.
But we're the ones leading the charge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0010
rows.name: Assert

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0011
rows.name: Assure him that you have the guts.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0020
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0021
rows.name: Explain to him that you didn't come to join up.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Heh, so you say. Though, I'll admit there's
a fire in your eyes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0004
rows.name: No? Huh. Must be the outfit that threw me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0005
rows.name:
Wait a sec... You're [ST:playername ], right?
From Elma's team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0030
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0031
rows.name: Confirm his suspicion.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask how he knows your name.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0006
rows.name: Aha! Thought so. I've heard all the stories![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0007
rows.name:
It's your own fault! You've been out there
making quite the name for yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Bunch of BLADEs in my line have been talking about
this crazy new rook who keeps racking up the glory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0009
rows.name:
I been wanting to meet you for a while now!
Name's Corwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0010
rows.name: I lead the team here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0050
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask about Corwin's team.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0060
rows.name: Greet

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0061
rows.name: Exchange friendly greetings.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0011
rows.name:
Curious about other teams, are you?
Should ol' Elma be worried? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0013
rows.name:
Well, let's see. This crazy rock we landed on
is full of weird new threats and mysteries, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0014
rows.name:
The mission of the Pathfinders is to crush those
threats and crack those mysteries. Job ends when
the whole place is charted and settled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0015
rows.name:
And for some reason, my team's full of people
with more curiosity than sense. They're like a
damn pack of wide-eyed kids most days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0016
rows.name:
Heeeey, look who's got manners! I like it.
You and me are gonna get along just fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0017
rows.name:
Long as we're not competing for a gig, that is.
Happens in our line from time to time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0018
rows.name:
I suppose you could say it's colleagues first,
friends second. Got it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0019
rows.name: ...Mm? Yo, boss! Who's the noob?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0020
rows.name:
I take it you've heard the name
[ST:playername ] before?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0021
rows.name: Sure, that's Elma's new—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0022
rows.name: Wait, THIS is [ST:playername ]?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0023
rows.name:
Sure is! And I'm hoping [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] might actually give you
a couple of tips on how to get things done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Aw, come on, boss! Besides, how do we know it ain't
all just talk? You actually seen [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] in action yet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0025
rows.name:
I mean, it's Elma we're talking about here.
Any idiot with half a brain cell could ride her
coattails to glory! ...Uh, no offense, noob.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0071
rows.name: Don't take offense.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0080
rows.name: Challenge

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0081
rows.name: Take great offense.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0026
rows.name: Hah! And humble, too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0027
rows.name: Don't bother playing along with this idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0028
rows.name:
You're out of his league, and he knows it!
Might as well break it to him straight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0029
rows.name:
Rrrgh... I know you're just doing this for kicks,
but I ain't having it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0030
rows.name:
Heh. We heard you were feisty—looks like
that much is true, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0031
rows.name:
What say we have a little test to see just
how tough you really are, noob?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0032
rows.name:
I just took on a mission to find the Ensanguined Font
in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0033
rows.name:
What do you say you and me have a race to see
who finds it first? BLADE against BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0034
rows.name:
Heh. Bates is really fired up about this.
Although, frankly, I'm curious myself to see
what you're really made of.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0035
rows.name: Plus, a friendly rival might just be what he needs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0036
rows.name:
And you never know—you might get
something good out of it too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Perfect! I'm heading out now.
Have fun eating my dust, noob![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0038
rows.name:
You may think you're hot stuff now,
but I've been a BLADE longer than you,
and I ain't losing to some rookie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0039
rows.name:
Time for you to learn Elma's team ain't the
only powerhouse around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0040
rows.name:
Hah! Can't say I saw this coming, but thanks
for lighting a fire under the kid's ass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0041
rows.name:
These little contests can be fun. All part of
helping out your fellow BLADEs, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0091
rows.name: Tell Corwin that you could do with a fresh challenge.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0101
rows.name: Warn Corwin that such competitiveness isn't productive.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0042
rows.name:
Heh. I figured you'd get it.
You practically ooze experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0043
rows.name:
I'm sure you didn't get this far without a bit of help
and friendly competition, right? I'm no different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0044
rows.name:
Half the time, the thought that gets me out of
bed and into the field is, "I'm not letting those
other guys hog all the glory!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0045
rows.name:
Huh. Well, I'm not the judging type, but that
kind of attitude will only get you so far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0046
rows.name:
In our line, playing nice works until it doesn't.
Past that, you top out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0047
rows.name:
But hey, everybody's got their own way.
That's just how I see it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0048
rows.name:
Anyway, it's time to fire up that frontier spirit
and get out there! Strip off that veil of mystery,
and start ogling Mira in all her glory![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0049
rows.name: You decide to take Bates up on his little contest?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0050
rows.name:
No harm in it, eh? And you might just find it
helps you grow as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0051
rows.name:
Perfect! I'm heading out now.
Have fun eating my dust, noob![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0052
rows.name:
You may think you're hot stuff now,
but I've been a BLADE longer than you,
and I ain't losing to some rookie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0053
rows.name:
Time for you to learn Elma's team ain't the
only powerhouse around![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0055
rows.name:
Heh. If nothing else, thanks for lighting a fire under
the kid's ass. It's all part of helping each other out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0111
rows.name: Tell Corwin that fresh challenges are always welcome.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0120
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0121
rows.name: Warn Corwin that such competitiveness isn't productive.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0056
rows.name:
Heh. I figured you'd get it.
You practically ooze experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0057
rows.name:
I'm sure you didn't get this far without a bit of help
and friendly competition, right? I'm no different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0058
rows.name:
Half the time, the thought that gets me out of
bed and into the field is, "I'm not letting those
other guys hog all the glory!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0059
rows.name:
Huh. Well, I'm not the judging type, but that
kind of attitude will only get you so far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0060
rows.name:
In our line, playing nice works until it doesn't.
Past that, you top out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0061
rows.name:
But hey, everybody's got their own way.
That's just how I see it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0062
rows.name:
Anyway, it's time to fire up that frontier spirit
and get out there! Strip off that veil of mystery,
and start ogling Mira in all her glory![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0063
rows.name:
Bates is still just a rookie, but he's a rookie
I happened to train.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0110
rows.name:
If you fart around and waste time,
he'll beat you to the punch for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0064
rows.name: Now, get out there and find that Ensanguined Font![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0065
rows.name:
Glad to see you're safe. You didn't get attacked
by any weird hostiles out there, did you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0130
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0131
rows.name: Tell Corwin everything was fine.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0140
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0141
rows.name: Ask Corwin why he is concerned.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0066
rows.name: Oh. Good. Yeah, that's good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0068
rows.name:
Seems Bates ran across a strange mob of puges led
by a powerful black Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0069
rows.name:
Last transmission we got from him,
they'd totaled his Skell and sent him packing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0070
rows.name:
We're headed out there to grab Bates now.
I don't know who these punks are, but they
messed with the wrong team![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0150
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0151
rows.name: Offer to help out.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0160
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0161
rows.name: Wish them good luck.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0071
rows.name:
Thanks! Maybe we can all grab a round
together when we get back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0072
rows.name:
Oh, and here's a reward for before.
It's not much, but you earned it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0073
rows.name:
We're ready to roll out, boss!
Just give the word![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0074
rows.name: All right, let's move! We got a rook to rescue![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0075
rows.name: Damn. You're a real softy, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0076
rows.name:
I can't make any promises on what you'll find
waiting for you out there, understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0077
rows.name:
But even so, you still want to go?
You're willing to risk your neck for our friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0078
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0079
rows.name:
Well, hell. If you're offering, I'd be an idiot
not to take you up on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0080
rows.name:
Last we heard, Bates sent up an SOS from
Everwhelm Falls in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0081
rows.name:
We'll be tracking him as well, which means we'll
get this idiot home alive no matter what it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0082
rows.name:
Bates may be a greenhorn, but put him in a
Skell and he can more than hold his own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0083
rows.name:
And yet whatever he went up against mopped
the floor with him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0084
rows.name:
In any case, we got no idea what we're dealing with,
so be damn careful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0085
rows.name: Thanks a million! Bates told me everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0086
rows.name:
Poor kid practically pissed his pants just talking about
that black Skell thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0087
rows.name:
But don't you worry—I beat some courage into him.
He'll be fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0170
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0171
rows.name: Show concern for poor Bates.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0180
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0181
rows.name: Tell Corwin that Bates got what he deserved.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0088
rows.name:
Hah! Well, ain't that sweet! Sorry, but we play
by different rules here on my team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0089
rows.name:
If a buddy can't stand, you help 'em up by
beating 'em till they do![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0090
rows.name:
See? I knew you'd get it! Is that how you
guys roll on Elma's team, too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0091
rows.name:
In any case, we owe you one. Or more to the
point, we owe you this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0092
rows.name: Oh, hey. You ran across that black Skell too, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0093
rows.name:
Tell it to me straight—how rough is this thing
that's gunning for us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0190
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0191
rows.name: Express your concerns about the threat it poses.

rows.label: qev013201_JNK0200
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev013201_SEL0201
rows.name: Tell Corwin it's nothing to worry about.

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0094
rows.name:
If YOU say that, it must really be nasty.
And it seems to be going after BLADEs specifically.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0095
rows.name:
Maybe I should pass the warning along to my men.
Lemme run it by Raleigh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0096
rows.name:
In any case, good luck with your work,
and let's both of us stay safe, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0097
rows.name:
Hah! We got a real hero here!
Far cry from that whiny little Bates...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0098
rows.name:
Still, if it's specifically targeting BLADEs, it's probably
worth having Raleigh keep an eye out for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013201_MSG0099
rows.name:
I'm not too scared myself, but there's no harm
in keeping safe, right? Anyway, you stay safe too,
and good luck with your work out there.[ST:wait ]
